title: Friends Font (credits)
content:
Does anyone know the font that they use at the end of the tv show “Friends” for their credits? Sorry, I don’t have a example. I’ve been looking for this font for a long time now.

Any help is appreciated!

Karen
author: khw1470

comments.content:
I never spent much time watching “Friends” so I have no recollection of the opening or closing titles.

But take a look at this dedicated “ [Friends](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604052341/http:/www.friendscafe.org/)” site and let us know if you can find a sample of the type you are looking for.

—————————————————————  
Yes, I’m old, but I’m back in style!

There is something here that looks similar, if my memory serves me right…

[http://www.dafont.com/en/font.php?file=gabriel\_weiss\_frien](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604052341/http:/www.dafont.com/en/font.php?file=gabriel_weiss_frien)

Not sure if the friends site that was mentioned uses the actual friends font or if the above link is correct either, but maybe this will work?
